articles.title: What is monkeypox outbreak that is raising concerns globally? - India Today
articles.description: Nearly 100 cases of Monkeypox have been reported in several parts of the world, a disease that has largely remained confined to Africa. Scientists are baffled at the transmission of the disease that is often fatal.
